record.creatorPhotographer: Osumi, J. M.; Army and Navy Photographer
record.description: Waseda University Team guests of the University of Chicago. First row, left to right: S. Matsumoto, J. Ishii, N. Tominaga, and T. Kubota; second row: G. Taniguchi, T. Kato, K. Tanaka, T. Oshita, J. Kuji, and F. Arita; third row: J. Nagano, S. Takamatsu, Professor Iso Abe (director of athletics), C. Tobita (coach), and M. Nakamura (sub-manager).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
